name: IronPower
description:
IronPower is a mecha themed VR fighting game inspired by movies like and . With the immersive VR technology, player can now ride their frame into battle.

Controls:
Punch: There are four types of attack you may utilize in game: Straight, Hook, Swing and Jab. You may use any of them from both hand. The Straight and Swing aim the head while the Hook and Jab aim the body. All punches are delivered though motion control.
Combo:With Eight possible attack you may channel them into a powerful combo. It requires a lot of skill and practice to perform a full combo but will destroy your opponent if do it right.
Ultimate: Each frame have their unique Ultimate Power. Unleashing them is rather straightforward, simply press the designated HTC Vive controller button.

The winning strategies:
Before we get to the winning strategies, let’s talk about the Energy first :
Attack, Defend and Ultimate consumes variate amount of Energy, the Generator are located in the body area and will generate Energy for the frame. Damaging the body will stop the Generator from generating Energy.
All of the attack are aiming at head and body, but there are more than head and body on your frame. Your arms are capable of both offence and defence. You can use your arm to block enemy attack but blocking will damage the arm’s armor.
Depleting your opponent’s head armor win you the round, so a direct head hit is always the most effective offence.
Depleting your opponent’s body armor stop their Energy generation, you win the round if your opponent deplete their Energy,this gives you an alternative strategy.
Depleting your opponent’s arm armor stops them from using punches. You must keep a close eye on your arm armor if you rely heavily on defence.

Choose your Frame:
Each Frame have their unique skill tree, parts upgrade and Ultimate Power. Whether you like offence, defence or personal skill, you will find a Frame that suites you.
